name: Sematary
description: '''Zane Steckler''' (born December 22, 2000), known professionally as '''Sematary''', is an American rapper, songwriter, and record producer. He began releasing music, and founded the Haunted Mound rap collective, both in 2019. Sematary has released eight mixtapes and three EPs throughout his career, and his distorted and overblown production style coupled with [[Internet memes#deep-fried|deep-fried]] internet aesthetic have garnered him a [[cult following]] online.
